WUnderground Gauge Pack Barometric Pressure (28 to 32)

Current Indigo image selection heuristics can't control for fractional values 
(i.e., 32.01) so the plugin converts pressure values to whole numbers.  Therefore, the
value pressure value of 28.00 is converted to 2800 for the icon value.

Pressure | Needle	
=================
2800	225
2804	228
2808	230
2812	233
2816	236
2820	239
2824	241
2828	244
2832	247
2836	249
2840	252
2844	255
2848	257
2852	260
2856	263
2860	266
2864	268
2868	271
2872	274
2876	276
2880	279
2884	282
2888	284
2892	287
2896	290
2900	293
2904	295
2908	298
2912	301
2916	303
2920	306
2924	309
2928	311
2932	314
2936	317
2940	320
2944	322
2948	325
2952	328
2956	330
2960	333
2964	336
2968	338
2972	341
2976	344
2980	347
2984	349
2988	352
2992	355
2996	357
3000	0
3004	3
3008	5
3012	8
3016	11
3020	14
3024	16
3028	19
3032	22

3044	30

3200	135
